author: Poongothai Aladi Aruna
title: Test, test, test for the virus
description: Travel bans and quarantines are imperative, but testing alone can reveal the extent of the disease
content: The novel coronavirus differs from other pandemics because of its exponential speed of transmission. The coronavirus is a novel virus because the genetic RNA has undergone mutation recently to infect humans from an animal source, thus converting a zoonotic di… [+3610 chars]
